page.title: 20Summary and Thank Yous.
page.content: In the process of surveying our block we have discovered a lot about the{land,}the{amenities,}the{people} and{ourselves.}We have obtained information which hopefully will be of value to future users, or perusers, of the Domesday Discs. However, perhaps the chief value of the project has been the opportunity it has provided for children, and adults, to get out and discover their own{surroundings.} The compilation of information has entailed a lot of work and{credit}must be given to many people for their {help:-}GEORGE FENTHAM SCHOOL All the Juniors, especially Class 2;Mr.David Wilkins;Mrs.Sue Ball;Mrs.Eileen Lamb. SOLIHULL SIXTH FORM COLLEGE Mr.I.Sharpe;Mrs.Janis Bolton;Mrs.Jane Hunt;Students-Graham Edwards,Samantha Harris,Catherine Owens,Jane Parker, Mike Parker,Cecilia Persson.
